additional parameters of the error. For example, the signingId of TvInteractiveAppCallback#onRequestSigning(String, String, String, String, byte[]) can be included to identify the related signing request, and the method name "onRequestSigning" can also be added to the params.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable Sub NotifyRecordingScheduled (recordingId As String, requestId As String)
public: virtual void NotifyRecordingScheduled(System::String ^ recordingId, System::String ^ requestId);
public virtual void NotifyRecordingScheduled (string recordingId, string? requestId);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void NotifyRecordingScheduled(string recordingId, string requestId) cil managed
abstract member NotifyRecordingScheduled : string * string -> unit override this.NotifyRecordingScheduled : string * string -> unit

Docs.param: The ID assigned to this recording by the app. It can be used to send recording related requests such as TvInteractiveAppService.Session#requestStopRecording(String).

The ID of the request when TvInteractiveAppService.Session#requestScheduleRecording is called. null if the recording is not triggered by a request. This ID should be created by the TvInteractiveAppService and can be any string.
Docs.summary: This is called to notify the corresponding interactive app service when the recording has been scheduled.

remarks.para: This is called to notify the corresponding interactive app service when the recording has been scheduled.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created andÂ shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void NotifyRecordingStarted(string recordingId, string requestId) cil managed
abstract member NotifyRecordingStarted : string * string -> unit override this.NotifyRecordingStarted : string * string -> unit

Docs.param: The ID of the recording started. This ID is created and maintained by the TV app and is used to identify the recording in the future.

The ID of the request when TvInteractiveAppService.Session#requestStartRecording(String, Uri) is called. null if the recording is not triggered by a request. This ID should be created by the TvInteractiveAppService and can be any string.
Docs.summary: Alerts the related TV interactive app service that a recording has been started.

remarks.para: Alerts the related TV interactive app service that a recording has been started.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created andÂ shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

public: virtual void NotifyTimeShiftStatusChanged(System::String ^ inputId, Android::Media::TV::TimeShiftStatus status);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void NotifyTimeShiftStatusChanged(string inputId, valuetype Android.Media.TV.TimeShiftStatus status) cil managed
abstract member NotifyTimeShiftStatusChanged : string * Android.Media.TV.TimeShiftStatus -> unit override this.NotifyTimeShiftStatusChanged : string * Android.Media.TV.TimeShiftStatus -> unit

Docs.param: The ID of the input for which the time shift status has changed.

The status of which the input has changed to. Should be one of the following.
  • TvInputManager#TIME_SHIFT_STATUS_UNKNOWN
  • TvInputManager#TIME_SHIFT_STATUS_UNSUPPORTED
  • TvInputManager#TIME_SHIFT_STATUS_UNAVAILABLE
  • TvInputManager#TIME_SHIFT_STATUS_AVAILABLE
Docs.summary: Notifies the corresponding TvInteractiveAppService when time shift status is changed.

remarks.para: Notifies the corresponding TvInteractiveAppService when time shift status is changed.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created andÂ shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.param: The type of message received, such as TvInputManager#TV_MESSAGE_TYPE_WATERMARK

The raw data of the message. The bundle keys are: TvInputManager#TV_MESSAGE_KEY_STREAM_ID, TvInputManager#TV_MESSAGE_KEY_GROUP_ID, TvInputManager#TV_MESSAGE_KEY_SUBTYPE, TvInputManager#TV_MESSAGE_KEY_RAW_DATA. See TvInputManager#TV_MESSAGE_KEY_SUBTYPE for more information on how to parse this data.
Docs.summary: This is called to notify the corresponding interactive app service when a new TV message is received.

remarks.para: This is called to notify the corresponding interactive app service when a new TV message is received.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created andÂ shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable Sub SendAvailableSpeeds (speeds As Single())
public: virtual void SendAvailableSpeeds(cli::array <float> ^ speeds);
public virtual void SendAvailableSpeeds (float[] speeds);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SendAvailableSpeeds(float32[] speeds) cil managed
abstract member SendAvailableSpeeds : single[] -> unit override this.SendAvailableSpeeds : single[] -> unit

Docs.param: An ordered array of playback speeds, expressed as values relative to the normal playback speed (1.0), at which the current content can be played as a time-shifted broadcast. This is an empty array if the supported playback speeds are unknown or the video/broadcast is not in time shift mode. If currently in time shift mode, this array will normally include at least the values 1.0 (normal speed) and 0.0 (paused).
Docs.summary: Sends the available supported playback speeds to the TV interactive app bound to this view.

remarks.para: Sends the available supported playback speeds to the TV interactive app bound to this view.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created andÂ shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable Sub SendSigningResult (signingId As String, result As Byte())
public: virtual void SendSigningResult(System::String ^ signingId, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ result);
public virtual void SendSigningResult (string signingId, byte[] result);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SendSigningResult(string signingId, unsigned int8[] result) cil managed
abstract member SendSigningResult : string * byte[] -> unit override this.SendSigningResult : string * byte[] -> unit

Docs.param: the ID to identify the request. It's the same as the corresponding ID in TvInteractiveAppService.Session#requestSigning(String, String, String, byte[])
the signed result.
Docs.summary: Sends signing result to related TV interactive app.

remarks.para: Sends signing result to related TV interactive app.

This is used when the corresponding server of the broadcast-independent interactive app requires signing during handshaking, and the interactive app service doesn't have the built-in private key. The private key is provided by the content providers and pre-built in the related app, such as TV app.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created andÂ shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

A Teletext Application is a broadcast-related application to display text and basic graphics.
